items.sentence: Tom doesn\'t want to give up his dream of becoming an astronaut.
I\'d like to thank you again for everything you\'ve done for us.
Tom made it clear that he didn\'t want anything to do with Mary.
Tom and Mary dipped into their savings to buy their first house.
Tom didn\'t think that Mary would actually carry out her threat.
Didn\'t you know that Tom was going to be in Australia all week?
Don\'t forget to tell Mary that she has to get home before 2:30.
I think that I now have enough money to buy the car that I want.
Tom wished he hadn\'t promised Mary he\'d go to Boston with her.
Tom and Mary haven\'t yet told anybody they\'re getting married.
How do you know it\'s a bad movie if you\'ve never even seen it?
I\'d like for Tom to tell you who he was with on Saturday night.
I forgot to tell you that Tom is coming over for dinner tonight.
I grew up speaking French to my mother and English to my father.
I had no idea that Tom was planning to tell Mary not to do that.
French isn\'t taught in our schools the way it should be taught.
Tom didn\'t seem to care that Mary didn\'t want him to be there.
Tom\'s parents kept him locked in the basement for three months.
Thirteen children and three adults were injured in the accident.
Tom knew that Mary told John that he should break up with Alice.
When Tom\'s cellphone rang, Mary nearly jumped out of her chair.
Would you mind if I took my shirt off? It\'s really hot in here.
Tom will never admit to being wrong even if he knows that he is.
I always thought that Tom and Mary would eventually get married.
I asked many people about the store, but no one had heard of it.
Tom and I aren\'t going to see each other again for a long time.
Now it\'s time for me to discuss a couple of rules with you all.
Both Tom and Mary need to stay in Boston for another three days.
Tom didn\'t realize Mary shouldn\'t be doing what she was doing.
Tom has to buy a book. That\'s why he\'s going to the bookstore.
We\'re not talking about you. We\'re talking about someone else.
You would\'ve gotten away with it if Tom hadn\'t seen you do it.
Unfortunately, Tom isn\'t the one who has the final say on this.
Tom has so many friends that he can\'t remember all their names.
Tom said Mary would probably not give him permission to do that.
The easiest way to find out what you want to know is to ask Tom.
I never thought it\'d be this hard to get Tom to accept the job.
You\'re not the only one who has had problems with Tom, are you?
You\'re the only person I know besides Tom who likes to do that.
You\'re the only person that I know who has ever visited Boston.
Why did you ask us for help if you didn\'t really want our help?

I want to know what\'s going to be going on here this afternoon.

It\'s better to regret what you\'ve done than what you haven\'t.
Tom thinks that women always tell their best friends everything.
Tom had the painting appraised by an expert before he bought it.
I appreciate what you\'re doing, but I don\'t think it\'ll help.
I wish I could be more optimistic about what\'s going to happen.
I wasn\'t surprised when Tom told me what he was planning to do.
